events.name: Tottenham Hotspur at West Ham United

headlines.description: Jose Mourinho enjoyed the perfect start as Tottenham boss with a 3-2 victory against West Ham United at the London Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mourinho off to winning start at Tottenham

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers continued their sparkling run of form in the Premier League with a 2-1 victory over 10-man Bournemouth at the Vitality Stadi
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves punish 10-man Bournemouth to extend unbeaten run
Lacazette won't celebrate equaliser in Arsenal draw

events.name: Leicester City at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Second-half goals from Ayoze Perez and Jamie Vardy earned Leicester City a convincing 2-0 Premier League win over Brighton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester cruise to win away at Brighton
Liverpool win at Palace amid VAR controversy

headlines.description: Todd Cantwell and Dennis Srbeny scored a brace of rare away goals to give struggling Norwich a 2-0 win over Everton, a result which sees them climb
headlines.shortLinkText: Rare away goals give Norwich win over Everton

headlines.description: Bottom club Watford's miserable season continued with a 3-0 defeat to a clinical Burnley at Vicarage Road in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Woeful Watford's home troubles continue with Burnley defeat

headlines.description: Manchester City fought back from a goal down to beat Chelsea 3-1 at the Etihad Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: City beat Chelsea with De Bruyne, Mahrez goals
